1.name: MOP Selection
1.description: Select a specific  method of payment, based on payment’s attributes and other data

2.name: MOP Calendar
2.description: Set in advance the working and non-working days of the MOP

3.name: MOP attribute -Advance automatically to day after holiday
3.description: Determines whether the payment’s VD will be advanced to the nearest business date if the original VD falls on a holiday in the MOP"s calendar

4.name: MT selection
4.description: Define the Message Type expected by this MOP

5.name: MOP accepted VD
5.description: Send a transaction to a specific MOP only if the transaction’s VD is within the MOP"s required range of VD

6.name: MOP VD extension
6.description: send a transaction via a specific MOP only when in the MOP"s date range, and up Until then  the transaction will park the  schedule Q

7.name: MOP attribute -MOP Default Cutoff
7.description: Maintain MOP cutoff, to set the default window for its operation

8.name: MOP operating hours
8.description: hold payments that are received prior to operation time of the MOP

9.name: Cutoff / Missed Cutoff
9.description: Final Cutoff for the current business day has been reached

10.name: MOP attribute - MOP currency
10.description: Set the currency in which the MOP settles the funds

11.name: MOP attribute - MOP Amount
11.description: Set the minimum and maximum amount  for the payments sent through the MOP

12.name: MOP attribute - MOP selected by user
12.description: Enable MOP to be selected as a credit MOP by the user in manually created payments

13.name: MOP attribute - Force from schedule Q
13.description: Enable a user to manually force a message out of schedule Q

14.name: MOP attribute - MOP FIN copy
14.description: embed the FIN copy service code in the SWIFT message, if required

15.name: MOP attribute -MOP Identifier
15.description: Hold the account number to be used (settlement account) and the office BIC that will identify the office when sending a transaction via this MOP

16.name: MOP attribute -MOP Default Identifier
16.description: Indicate whether this identifier is the default identifier of the office in case there are more than one BIC for the same office

17.name: MOP attribute -ACK/Confirmation (Communication preferences)
17.description: Wait for both SWIFT ACK and/or clearing acknowledgement (012) for outgoing payment

18.name: MOP attribute -Membership required
18.description: Indicate whether the MOP requires membership

19.name: MOP attribute - Membership type
19.description: Indicate for each bank, whether a it is a direct or indirect member of this MOP

20.name: MOP attribute -Membership check level
20.description: Indicate on which level to check the membership, according to BIC 11 or BIC 8

21.name: MOP attribute -Main BIC membership
21.description: GPP search for member in MOP using BIC 8 (that marked as main BIC), in case a member was not found when searched with BIC 11

22.name: MOP attribute -Add member to chain
22.description: Add the main BIC to the credit chain

23.name: MOP attribute -RMA required
23.description: Indicate whether the MOP requires RMA validation

24.name: Party enrichment
24.description: Enrich missing details in messages sent via a specific MOP

25.name: Mapping Out/ MOP Message STP validations
25.description: Format the message correctly as per the MOP specifications, and as per agreements done with other banks

26.name: Bank Routing
26.description: Pay through the corresponding bank if no other option is available

31.name: Transfer method
31.description: Define the transfer method as serial/ direct and cover

32.name: Transfer method in SSI
32.description: Determines whether to send the message as serial or direct and cover

33.name: Transfer method profile
33.description: Determines transfer method as serial or direct & cover per currency & country combination

34.name: Transfer method in party profile
34.description: Set the transfer method as serial or direct & cover per party

35.name: Transfer method selection
35.description: Set the transfer method as serial or direct & cover

36.name: Override defined transfer method
36.description: Define the system behavior in case it cannot follow the user preferred transfer method

37.name: Direct/Cover release
37.description: Refrain from sending the direct until the cover is sent and cleared successfully

38.name: Banking priority
38.description: Set the banking priority and embed it in SWIFT message header
